title: A suggestion for additional audio option in game.
body: it would be very usefull if you could add in game option to switch audio to a different audio output device on pc... please consider it.. thank you.

replies.body:
Hey, that sounds like a pretty good idea. I think it would definitely help out those with many audio devices. 

I encourage you to post this to [Miscellaneous](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous), where suggestions are meant to go and will get more traction.
